website_summaries.verdict: Huge teeth model that's correctly proportioned, so it's great for classroom displays.
pros: With a hinged top and bottom jaw, you can easily point out individual teeth
This larger model works nicely for demonstrations in large classrooms
Small kids will love learning how to brush on these huge teeth
cons: White part of the teeth can become discolored over time

customer_reviews.title: Great for speech therapy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use as a visual model for speech therapy. I learned about it from another speech therapist, however they were unhappy with their model because it made a loud noise when you opened and closed the mouth. This issue must have been improved on newer models because the one I just received does not do that! Also the tongue easily unscrews so that you can move it to model correct tongue placement for targeted sounds. I’m so happy with this model and it is half the price of models marketed to speech therapists :)
customer_reviews.author: Mindymae

customer_reviews.title: Giant mouth = GREAT for teaching toddler how to brush teeth!
customer_reviews.text: Giant Mouth! Great for teaching toddlers how to brush their teeth. The mouth has bendable connectors that can open the mouth all the way. Minus a star since the teeth are fused together, so I am unable to teach how to floss. Overall, a good product. Giant red toothbrush in picture is sold separately by Fun Inc.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good mouth model
customer_reviews.text: I use this mouth model at work to demonstrate proper tongue and teeth placement. The model is bigger than you'd expect, which is nice! The tongue moves a little bit, but it is screwed into the bottom, so it doesn't have full range of motion. The white part also gets dirty and scuffed pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Parent123

customer_reviews.title: Great for Speech Therapy
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited to use this mouth for speech therapy. I unscrewed the tongue to be able to show placement for target speech sounds. I like that it is made of plastic, which will allow for me easily sanitize between students.
customer_reviews.author: Dyonne

customer_reviews.title: The product looks great on photo but when product arrives it has very ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. The product looks great on photo but when product arrives it has very low quality. The pink from the gums crosses over to the teeth margins.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Arreola

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, bendy and silent
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I was looking at a more expensive one and went for this and I'm so glad I did! I'm a speech pathologist and use it all the time. The paint isn't the neatest around the teeth, but it's good quality and bends easily and doesn't make any sound.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha Simoni

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My class loved this!! It opens all the way giving more children an opportunity to play at the same time. I also bought a giant toothbrush, it was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: A great mouth model
customer_reviews.text: This mouth model is high quality and perfect for teaching speech sounds or dental hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: This mouth model is so awesome and also a great size
customer_reviews.text: This mouth model is so awesome and also a great size. I use it in elementary schools for oral hygiene lessons. The only issue I have with it, is that the teeth do not actually have spaces in between them so there is No way to demonstrate "How to Floss Properly". Aside from that, its a great model.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality
customer_reviews.text: The colors were a little 'offish' and it wasn't QUITE as nice as I was expecting, but solidly built and they do exactly what I need them to do, which is open and close so i can point in various spots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for classroom or larger dental instruction! Arrived on time and they are selling for an unbeatable price! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought for oral health lesson for teaching. did the job well!
customer_reviews.author: Eczema Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great size for small group presentation
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small group presentation, only wish the teeth were separated for flossing demo. Shipped right away.
customer_reviews.author: kimp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it, but the tongue fell out the next day....Other than that it was ok...
customer_reviews.author: Jodene Simms

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than i expected but kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Samer Abdallah

customer_reviews.title: Great for speech therapy!
customer_reviews.text: This large model is perfect for showing tongue placement to my speech therapy kiddos. The somewhat rigid tongue is held in place by a single screw (see picture) and is easily removed. Much cheaper than other models I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for speech therapy
customer_reviews.text: I seem to misplace my little super duper mouths or they are broken by a student. This thing can not be lost. It's huge. and the kids love it. They love seeing the alveolar ridge and finding out that have bottom and TOP molars. It's been super handy for teaching the /r/ sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: One Happy SLP
customer_reviews.text: Worth the long wait! It took a long time to get here but it is high quality and good size. So cute and has proven to be very functional for speech therapy!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great for speech!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for speech therapy! I’m so happy I purchased this 🤩 it’s perfect for teaching about placement of the tongue for different sounds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me study for school. It came with the teeth stained and the tongue is super wobbly. It’s held in place with a screw but it’s not tight at all.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

product_meta.title: SMKF Large Anatomical Teeth Models - Dentist Teaching Oral Hygiene Model 8.66 5.9 5.5 inches
product_meta.description:
Description
100% brand new and high quality
Great model for dentist to communicate with patients!
It is the best model for demonstration of children brushing teeth.
Useful equipment for students learning!
A model is Worth more than 1000 words!!!
Net weight: about 1.8pounds
The teeth are fixed in the base and can not be removed.
Packing List
1 piece as our pictures show
